column4: Hi Everyone, I had a quick question.  I wanted to install ubuntu server to use as a file server/media server (for my ps3).  I currently have Windows 7 with data I want to keep on it.  Can I install ubuntu without formatting?
you can resuize the windows partitions from within windows. or via the linux installer.
when in doubt.. make backups first
- thanks.  I will probably just backuip and install.  less risk!
